page.title: 16TRANSPORT
page.content: There are 3,500 people living in Horton Kirby and South Darenth, others live in isolated farm cottages and along Green St. Green Road. Public transport is limited and most families have their own vehicles. British Rail provides a service for commuters going East and West from London into Kent, with stations at Farningham Road and Longfield. 24 trains run daily between 5.55 and midnight. On Sunday there are 5 trains. London Country Buses - the 492 linking Horton Kirby and South Darenth with Dartford provides 20 1/2 hourly buses daily between 6.27 and 23.09. The 423 from Dartford to Longfield serves Green St. Green with 36 buses between 6.26 and 22.52. There is no Sunday service on either route.
